description:
This dataset includes an inventory of Montgomery County datasets and the current schedule for when each dataset is scheduled to be reviewed and published.  This information is a section in the Open Data Implementation Plan, which can be found in its entirety at:  http://montgomerycountymd.gov/open/.

Update frequency:  Annual (with updates to dataset status when published)
